languages.text: "Ваша интерпретация граничит с техноересью. Однако учитывая ваше положение, Лорд-капитан, я все же отвечу на него: с точки зрения мирянина вы достаточно точно описали наше положение. Уповаю на откровения Его и молю Его о наставлении".

"Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."
languages.original_text: "Ваша интерпретация граничит с техноересью. Однако учитывая ваше положение, Лорд-капитан, я все же отвечу на него: с точки зрения мирянина вы достаточно точно описали наше положение. Уповаю на откровения Его и молю Его о наставлении".

"Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

languages.text: “你的解释已经趋近于科技异端的说法了。不过，鉴于你的尊贵地位，舰长大人，我依然会回答这个问题。对于一个门外汉而言，你对我们当前处境的描述还是相对准确的。我把所有期望都寄托在祂的启示上，我谦卑地祈求祂的指引。”
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: “你的解释已经趋近于科技异端的说法了。不过，鉴于你的尊贵地位，舰长大人，我依然会回答这个问题。对于一个门外汉而言，你对我们当前处境的描述还是相对准确的。我把所有期望都寄托在祂的启示上，我谦卑地祈求祂的指引。”

languages.text: 「陛下の解釈は、技術的な異端に近いものです。ですが、ロード・キャプテン、ご自身の立場を考慮しても、それでもなおこう答えざるを得ません。素人にとって、陛下は我々の立場を比較的正確に述べています。自分は神の啓示に望みを託し、謙虚に神の導きを求める者なのです」
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの解釈は、技術的な異端に近いものです。ですが、ロード・キャプテン、あなたの立場を考慮しても、それでもなおこう答えざるを得ません。素人にとって、あなたは我々の立場を比較的正確に述べています。私は神の啓示に望みを託し、謙虚に神の導きを求める者なのです」
「陛下の解釈は、技術的な異端に近いものです。ですが、ロード・キャプテン、ご自身の立場を考慮しても、それでもなおこう答えざるを得ません。素人にとって、陛下は我々の立場を比較的正確に述べています。自分は神の啓示に望みを託し、謙虚に神の導きを求める者なのです」

languages.text: "Eure Interpretation grenzt an Tech-Ketzerei. Aber angesichts Eures Rangs werde ich dennoch antworten, Lord Captain: Für {mf|einen Laien|eine Laiin} habt Ihr unsere Situation relativ präzise beschrieben. Ich setze meine Hoffnung auf Seine Offenbarungen und bitte demütig um Seine Führung."
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Interpretation grenzt an Tech-Ketzerei. Aber angesichts Eures Rangs werde ich dennoch antworten, Lord Captain: Für {mf|einen Laien|eine Laiin} habt Ihr unsere Situation relativ präzise beschrieben. Ich setze meine Hoffnung auf Seine Offenbarungen und bitte demütig um Seine Führung."

languages.text: « Votre interprétation frôle la technohérésie. Néanmoins, compte tenu de votre rang, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je répondrai ceci : pour {mf|un|une} profane, vous avez décrit notre position avec une relative exactitude. Je place mes espoirs dans Ses révélations et Lui demande humblement de nous guider. »
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: « Votre interprétation frôle la technohérésie. Néanmoins, compte tenu de votre rang, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je répondrai ceci : pour {mf|un|une} profane, vous avez décrit notre position avec une relative exactitude. Je place mes espoirs dans Ses révélations et Lui demande humblement de nous guider. »

languages.text: «Su interpretación roza la tecnoherejía. No obstante, dado su rango, Lord Capitán, responderé igualmente: para ser leg{mf|o|a}, ha descrito nuestra posición con cierta exactitud. Pongo todas mis esperanzas en Sus revelaciones y ruego humildemente por Su guía».
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: «Su interpretación roza la tecnoherejía. No obstante, dado su rango, Lord Capitán, responderé igualmente: para ser leg{mf|o|a}, ha descrito nuestra posición con cierta exactitud. Pongo todas mis esperanzas en Sus revelaciones y ruego humildemente por Su guía».

languages.text: "Yorumunuz tekno kâfirliğin kıyılarında dolaşıyor ancak rütbenizi göz önünde bulundurarak yine de yanıt vereceğim Lord Kaptan: Konuda uzman olmamanıza rağmen, içinde bulunduğumuz vaziyeti nispeten isabetli bir şekilde tanımladınız. Umutlarımı O'nun vahiylerine bağlıyor, bize yol göstermesi için O'na yakarıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation is verging on tech-heresy. However, given your rank, Lord Captain, I will nevertheless respond: for a layperson, you have described our position with relative accuracy. I place my hopes in His revelations and humbly ask for His guidance."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yorumun tekno kâfirliğin kıyılarında dolaşıyor ancak rütben de göz önünde bulundurulduğunda Lord Kaptan, yine de yanıt vereceğim: Konuda uzman olmamana rağmen konumumuzu nispeten isabetli bir şekilde tanımladın. Umutlarımı O'nun vahiylerine bağlıyor, bize yol göstermesi için O'na yakarıyorum."
